cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 280 mi ESE of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward the north-central Gulf Coast (MS–AL coastline)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Mississippi-Alabama coast (mouth of Pearl River to AL-FL border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch west of Shell Beach LA to the mouth of the Mississippi River and east of Dauphin Island AL to Navarre FL; Tropical Storm Watch none in effect near Jacksonville.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning mouth of the Pearl River to the Alabama-Florida border; Tropical Storm Warning west of the mouth of the Pearl River to east of Morgan City LA and AL-FL border to Okaloosa-Walton County line FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: north-central Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana through coastal Mississippi and Alabama into the far western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty breezes from outer rain-bands; sustained tropical-storm-force winds not expected
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the northeast Florida Atlantic coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing showers, generally 1–2 inches or less
